title: Sustainable AI: An integrated model to guide public sector decision-making
research_description: This paper explores how sustainable AI, grounded in sustainable development theory, can guide public sector decision-making. It develops a conceptual model integrating five boundary conditions: Diversity, Capacity for learning, Capacity for self-organization, Common meaning, and Trust.
research_results: The study concludes that AI governance frameworks should incorporate the boundary conditions of sustainable AI, fostering inclusiveness, learning, and trust within the public sector.
future_research: Future research should explore empirical applications of the proposed model and examine the effects of integrating these boundary conditions on public sector AI governance.
